title: Replace ~60 println! in library crates with tracing
description:
Library crates (core, gpu-cfr, deep-cfr) use println!/eprintln! for progress reporting instead of structured logging. A library should not own stdout.

Files affected:
- core/src/game/hunl_postflop.rs (~10 calls) -- deal generation progress
- core/src/abstract_game.rs (~10 calls) -- abstract deal generation
- core/src/preflop/postflop_abstraction.rs (1 eprintln) -- SPR stats
- gpu-cfr/src/lib.rs (~17 calls) -- GPU init, iteration progress
- gpu-cfr/src/tiled.rs (~15 calls) -- tiled solver progress
- gpu-cfr/src/tabular.rs (~8 calls) -- tabular solver stats
- deep-cfr/src/solver.rs (~4 eprintln) -- SD-CFR training progress

Replace with tracing::info!/tracing::debug! or accept a progress callback. CLI crates (trainer, devserver) are fine as-is.
close_reason: Converted ~60 println!/eprintln! to tracing::info!/debug! across core, deep-cfr, and gpu-cfr. Removed dead flush_stdout() helpers.

title: Remove orphaned board_abstraction.rs (1,166 dead lines)
description: crates/core/src/preflop/board_abstraction.rs is not declared in mod.rs and has zero references anywhere in the codebase. It was left behind during a refactor to postflop_abstraction. Safe to delete entirely -- git remembers.

title: Clean up 5 dead struct fields behind #[allow(dead_code)]
description:
5 struct fields are stored but never read, all acknowledged with #[allow(dead_code)]:

- tauri-app/exploration.rs:79 -- subgame_config and solve_cache in StrategySource::SubgameSolve (scaffolding for unimplemented subgame solving)
- trainer/main.rs:443-445 -- min_per_class and max_rejections in SdCfrDealConfig (deserialized from YAML, never accessed)
- gpu-cfr/lib.rs:133 -- num_positions (computed, stored, never read)

The tauri-app fields are intentional scaffolding (keep until subgame solving lands). The other 3 can be removed or the allow annotations reviewed.
close_reason: Reviewed all 5 dead struct fields. All are intentional: tauri-app fields are scaffolding for future subgame solving, SdCfrDealConfig fields are for YAML forward-compat, gpu-cfr num_positions for struct symmetry. All properly annotated with #[allow(dead_code)]. No action needed.

title: Remove deprecated texture config fields
description: Remove num_flop_textures, num_turn_transitions, num_river_transitions, and ehs_samples from PostflopModelConfig. These are leftover from the old texture-based abstraction and are no longer used by any code path. Remove the fields, their default functions, serde annotations, and any references in sample YAML configs. Use #[serde(deny_unknown_fields)] or just let unknown fields fail naturally.
close_reason: Removed num_flop_textures, num_turn_transitions, num_river_transitions, ehs_samples from PostflopModelConfig. Tree now hardcodes 1 transition (imperfect recall). AbstractionCacheKey simplified.

title: Narrow pub visibility on 19 unused exports to pub(crate)
description:
Dead code crusade found 19 pub items never imported outside their defining module. Key clusters:
- hand_buckets.rs: 8 items (KmeansPoint trait, kmeans_generic, assign_clusters_generic, nearest_centroid_generic, recompute_centroids_generic, sq_dist_generic, kmeans, HistogramFeatures)
- equity.rs: 4 items (equity, clear_cache, cache_size, prewarm_cache -- prewarm_cache has zero callers)
- info_key.rs: decode_action_code (test-only)
- ehs.rs: avg_ehs_features, live_turn_cards (test-only)
- postflop_abstraction.rs: PostflopLayout, NUM_CANONICAL_HANDS (file-internal only)
- deep-cfr/eval.rs: TrajectoryPolicy (test-only)
- gpu-cfr/lib.rs: GpuNode, DecisionNodeInfo, collect_decision_nodes (crate-internal)

Action: downgrade to pub(crate) or remove. Items used only in tests can use pub(crate) + cfg(test) if needed.
close_reason: Narrowed 19 pub items to pub(crate) across 7 files. Build passes.

title: Re-enable abstraction caching for StreetBuckets
description: The abstraction cache was disabled during the StreetBuckets migration (trainer/src/main.rs). Update abstraction_cache.rs serialization to work with the new StreetBuckets data model instead of the old BoardAbstraction + HandBucketMapping. Re-enable cache loading in both the solve-preflop and hand-trace commands in trainer/src/main.rs. Verify round-trip: build → save → load → compare.
